remarks: Hypothesis builder for weak deduction theorem.  For more information, see the Deduction Theorem link on the Metamath Proof Explorer home page.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.)
statement:
elimh.1 $e |- ( ( ph <-> ( ( ph /\ ch ) \/ ( ps /\ -. ch ) ) ) -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
elimh.2 $e |- ( ( ps <-> ( ( ph /\ ch ) \/ ( ps /\ -. ch ) ) ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
elimh.3 $e |- th $.
elimh $p |- ta $.
